Question: Which two songs are featured in the soundtrack of the movie 'Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.' released in 2003?
Options:
A. Chann Chann and Dekhle Aankhon Mein Aankhien Daal (Remix)
B. Tumse Milke and Tera Hone Laga Hoon
C. Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna and Mitwa
D. Pehla Nasha and Chura Liya Hai Tumne Jo Dil Ko
Answer: Chann Chann and Dekhle Aankhon Mein Aankhien Daal (Remix)

Question: In the movie 'Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.' released in 2003, which two songs are part of the soundtrack composed by Anu Malik and feature vocals by Sunidhi Chauhan?
Options:
A. A. Dekhle Aankhon Mein Aankhien Daal and Subha Ho Gayee Mamu
B. B. Jaane Nahin Denge Tujhe and Chale Jaana
C. C. M.B.B.S. Theme and Bole Chudiyan

Answer: A. Dekhle Aankhon Mein Aankhien Daal and Subha Ho Gayee Mamu

Question: In the 2003 movie 'Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.', which two songs are connected through their inclusion in the film's soundtrack composed by Anu Malik?

B. jaane jigar and chura liya
